title: Champion Loops and Sound Effects
description: Champion Attacks, Specials and Menu Loops
longDescription: 141 Different Champion Battle Sounds Ranging from Archers, Gunners, to Machines, Magicians and Aliens. Includes experience, tower, destruction, droids, lasers and power ups. Preview Sounds https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QTpek9dRb9Q
